00001 /* This code was imported from OpenBSD.  It is on the
00002  * COLIN_PLUMB_MD5 branch should it need updating. -jhg
00003  *
00004  * Before using these functions directly look at
00005  * "md5sum.cpp" which defines an "md5sum" class which should
00006  * make things eaiser to use from c++.
00007  */
00008 
00009 /*      $OpenBSD: md5.h,v 1.1.2.1 2004/06/05 23:12:36 niklas Exp $      */
00010 
00011 /*
00012  * This code implements the MD5 message-digest algorithm.
00013  * The algorithm is due to Ron Rivest.  This code was
00014  * written by Colin Plumb in 1993, no copyright is claimed.
00015  * This code is in the public domain; do with it what you wish.
00016  *
00017  * Equivalent code is available from RSA Data Security, Inc.
00018  * This code has been tested against that, and is equivalent,
00019  * except that you don't need to include two pages of legalese
00020  * with every copy.
00021  */
00022 
00023 #ifndef _MD5_H_
00024 #define _MD5_H_
00025 
00026 //
00027 #include <stdlib.h>
00028 //
00029 #include <portability/affy-base-types.h>
00030 
00031 // some typedefs to smooth things over.
00032 typedef uint8_t   u_int8_t;
00033 typedef uint32_t  u_int32_t;
00034 typedef uint64_t  u_int64_t;
00035 
00036 #define MD5_BLOCK_LENGTH                64
00037 #define MD5_DIGEST_LENGTH               16
00038 
00040 typedef struct MD5Context {
00041         u_int32_t state[4];                     
00042         u_int64_t count;        
00043         u_int8_t buffer[MD5_BLOCK_LENGTH];      
00044 } MD5_CTX;
00045 
00046 void     MD5Init(MD5_CTX *);
00047 void     MD5Update(MD5_CTX *, const u_int8_t *, u_int32_t);
00048 void     MD5Final(u_int8_t [MD5_DIGEST_LENGTH], MD5_CTX *);
00049 void     MD5Transform(u_int32_t [4], const u_int8_t [MD5_BLOCK_LENGTH]);
00050 
00051 #endif /* _MD5_H_ */
